Perhaps this is an opportune moment to negotiate more favorable terms across all my dealings with them, or even consider using a portion of my considerable liquid wealth to purchase some of these rented properties outright, reducing my dependencies and securing my family's holdings in Venice more firmly. My reputation as a craftsman is paramount, built on quality and innovation, and any decision, be it regarding land or property, must ultimately serve to enhance that legacy and my family's standing within the Cittadini.
